text: Harry J Allen was a Canadian international lawn bowls player who competed in the 1930 British Empire Games. ==Bowls career== At the 1930 British Empire Games he won the silver medal in the rinks (fours) event with Jimmy Campbell, Mitch Thomas and Billy Rae. ==References== Category:Canadian male bowls players Category:Bowls players at the 1930 British Empire Games Category:Commonwealth Games silver medallists for Canada Category:Commonwealth Games medallists in lawn bowls
title: Harry Allen (bowls)
